name: Parentage (LD 48)
description:
Delve into the depths of the ocean in search of your lost father. Parentage suspenseful story-driven game (the first one I've made!) with a bunch of optional scannable items to get more bits of the story (16 in total if you're into 100%-ing)!

Avoid naval mines and scan any oddities you come by. Dive deep to uncover the mystery of what your father left behind.

Controls are explained in the tutorial, but if you need them in-game you can pause with 'Esc' or 'P'!

Controls:
WASD - Move Vessel
Shift/Ctrl - Descend
Space - Ascend
Left Click - Toggle light
Right Click - Scan
